name: Finger Drift Extreme
description:
The perfect game for time killing and competing against friends is here.

Tap on each side of the screen to rotate your vehicle and make awesome drifts while avoiding the other cars.

How long can you survive?

Things that the game implements:

+ Completely free!
+ Global leaderboard so you can check your ranking againts your friends and everyone.
+ Simple rules and controls, hours of fun.
+ You will improve your skills gradually over time.
+ Bomb power-up. If you get it, all other cars will explode!
+ Perfect for time killing while waiting or in short periods of time.

Download now "Finger Drift Extreme" for free and start playing!
